description: Adia Nutrition, Inc. produces probiotic chews and drink mixes. It offers balanced berry, unsweetened green tea, raspberry lemonade slim, lemon lime sport, and orange mango probiotic drink mixes; and berry and lemonade probiotic chews. The company provides its products online, as well as through its nutrition stores. Adia Nutrition, Inc. was formerly known as PivX Solutions Inc. and changed its name to Adia Nutrition, Inc. in May 2004. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Kurtistown, Hawaii.
